sqlMap.select: SELECT sru.userID, sru.userCode, sru.userName, sru.locked, sru.type FROM sysregisteruser sru WHERE sru.`userID` IN (SELECT DISTINCT t.`userID` FROM `sysuserrole` t WHERE t.`roleID` =:roleID) <#if userCode?exists && userCode!="" > AND sru.userCode like "%":userCode"%" </#if> <#if userName?exists && userName!="" > AND sru.userName like "%":userName"%" </#if> <#if locked?exists && locked!="" > AND sru.locked =:locked </#if> LIMIT :startRow,:endRow

sqlMap.sql: <#if roleName?exists && roleName!="" > AND sr.roleName LIKE "%":roleName"%" </#if> <#if attribute?exists && attribute!="" > AND sr.attribute =:attribute </#if> <!-- 被分配标识 --> <#if isAuth?exists && isAuth!="" > AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:userID) > 0 </#if> <!-- 当前登录人ID --> <#if loginUserID?exists && loginUserID!="" > AND ( ((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:loginUserID) > 0) OR ((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:userID) > 0) ) </#if>

SELECT sr.roleID,sr.roleName,sr.remark,sr.attribute <#if userID?exists && userID!="" > ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:userID) AS isAuth </#if> <#if loginUserID?exists && loginUserID!="" > ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:loginUserID) AS canAssign </#if> FROM sysrole sr WHERE 1=1 <#if attribute?exists && attribute!="" > AND sr.attribute =:attribute </#if>
<#if userID?exists && userID!="" > ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysuserrole sur WHERE sur.roleID=sr.roleID AND sur.userID=:userID) DESC </#if> <#if userID==""||userID==null > ORDER BY sr.createTime DESC,sr.updateTime DESC </#if> LIMIT :startRow,:endRow
